name: Sandy Crown
description:
Tips:

Don't let the ennemies enter your Sand Castle.

Vagues at top left mean round, you have to survive many rounds, and more and more after each levels.

Sable at top right is your currency, you can buy tower and enhancement.

The Tower DPS the enemies.

The Bucket push the enemies behind but have a cooldown.

The hammer repair 1PV for 1 sable, the double hammer repair the maximum.

Recommencer mean restart.

The green oval is continue.

Alt f4 the game to exit.

Sorry, this was litteraly my first game jam ^^' everything is not working.

This game was make for a shool project I have to do a tower defense in 1 week and an half all by myself. I made every thing and the game is playable through 4 levels. The game even has low poly graphics and UI, because I wanted to make something looking like a game, and not just an exercise.

The project is not working anymore, so I can't upgrade the game :/
